Progress will discontinue Telerik Platform on May 10th, 2018. Learn more

sample hybrid

Usage Synopsis
General $ appbuilder sample hybrid

Lists all available Apache Cordova sample apps with name, description, GitHub repository and clone command. To clone a selected sample app, run its clone command.

Related Commands

Command Description
cloud export Exports one of your projects from the cloud and initializes it for development

in the current directory. cloud | Lists all solutions and projects associated with your Telerik Platform account. create hybrid | Creates a new project from an Apache Cordova-based template. create native | Creates a new project from a NativeScript-based template. create screenbuilder | Creates a new project for hybrid development with Screen Builder. create | Creates a project for hybrid or native development. export | Exports a cloud-based project from a selected solution to facilitate the migration to a different framework. init hybrid | Initializes an existing Apache Cordova project for development in the current directory. init native | Initializes an existing NativeScript project for development in the current directory. init | Initializes an existing project for development. sample | Lists all available sample apps. sample native | Lists all available NativeScript sample apps. sample clone | Clones the selected sample app from GitHub to your local file system.
